General.Name: National Fertilizer Company SJSC
General.Description: MOBI Industry Co. manufactures and sells fertilizers and nitrogen compounds in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It provides plastics, soaps, industrial detergents, and washing and cleaning materials, as well as preparations. The company was formerly known as National Fertilizer Company Ltd. and changed its name to MOBI Industry Co. in November 2022. MOBI Industry Co. was founded in 1981 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: 7732, New Industrial Area, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 14334
